questions.questionText: Despite his initial hesitation, Rehman's ______ to contribute to the success of the project never wavered.
questions.solutionText: The correct answer is C) resolve. The sentence talks about Rehman's determination to contribute despite initial hesitation, so 'resolve' (meaning firm determination) fits best.

questions.questionText: The paper as shown in the figure is folded to make a cube where each square corresponds to a particular face of the cube. Which one of the following options correctly represents the cube?
questions.solutionText: This question requires visual analysis of the cube net. The correct answer is C.
